title: How Cameron Esposito is Revolutionizing Queer Media
itunes:title: How Cameron Esposito is Revolutionizing Queer Media
description:
LGBTQ representations on screen can be sooo awful. Cameron Esposito is trying to change that.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
